metadata.title: CVE-2019-15604 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Certificate Validation in Node.js 10, 12, and 13 causes the process to abort when sending a crafted X.509 certificate

criterions.comment: nodejs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1').
